languages.text: "Да, Мейв, расскажи. Каково это — сопровождать помазанни{rt_mf|ка|цу} Бога-Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Да, Мейв, расскажи. Каково это — сопровождать помазанника Бога-Императора".

languages.text: "Yeah, Maive, tell us! What's it like to be around one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"
languages.original_text: "Да, Мейв, расскажи. Каково это — сопровождать помазанни{rt_mf|ка|цу} Бога-Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Maive, tell us. What's it like to accompany one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"
"Yes, Maive, tell us. What's it like to accompany one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"
"Yes, Maive, tell us. What's it like to accompany one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"
"Yes, Maive, tell us. What's it like to accompany one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"
"Yeah, Maive, tell us! What's it like to be around one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"
"Yeah, Maive, tell us! What's it like to be around one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"

languages.text: “是啊，梅芙，和我们说说吧！在神皇的神选者身边是什么感觉？”
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Maive, tell us! What's it like to be around one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"

traits.locale_text: “是啊，梅芙，和我们说说吧！在神皇的神选者身边是什么感觉？”

languages.text: «¡Eso, Maive, cuenta, cuenta! ¿Cómo es estar en presencia de un{rt_mf|o|a} de l{rt_mf|o|a}s ungid{rt_mf|o|a}s del Dios Emperador?».
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Maive, tell us! What's it like to be around one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Eso, Maive, cuenta, cuenta! ¿Cómo es estar en presencia de un{rt_mf|o|a} de l{rt_mf|o|a}s ungid{rt_mf|o|a}s del Dios Emperador?».

languages.text: "Evet Maive, anlat bize! Tanrı İmparator'un kutsanmışlarından birinin yanında olmak nasıldı?"
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Maive, tell us! What's it like to be around one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"

traits.locale_text: "Evet Maive, anlat bize! Tanrı İmparator'un kutsanmışlarından birinin yanında olmak nasıldı?"

languages.text: 「そうだ、メイヴ、教えてくれよ！神帝陛下の後継者の周りにいるのはどんな感じなんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Maive, tell us! What's it like to be around one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ、メイヴ、教えてくれよ！神帝陛下の後継者の周りにいるのはどんな感じなんだ？」

languages.text: « Oui, dis-nous, Maive ! Qu'est-ce que ça fait d'être aux côtés de l'{rt_mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur-Dieu ? »
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Maive, tell us! What's it like to be around one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"

traits.locale_text: « Oui, dis-nous, Maive ! Qu'est-ce que ça fait d'être aux côtés de l'{rt_mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur-Dieu ? »

languages.text: "Ja, Maive, sagt schon! Wie ist das so, wenn man vor {rt_mf|dem|der} Gesalbten des Gottimperators steht?"
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Maive, tell us! What's it like to be around one of the God-Emperor's anointed?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Maive, sagt schon! Wie ist das so, wenn man vor {rt_mf|dem|der} Gesalbten des Gottimperators steht?"
